features.title: Powerful Pixel Art Conversion Features
features.subtitle: Convert Images to Wplace Art
features.description: Transform any image into stunning pixel art ready for Wplace.live with our advanced conversion tools and official color palette.

item-1.title: Drag & Drop Image Upload
item-1.description: Simply drag your images into the converter or click to browse. Supports PNG, JPG, and SVG files up to 5MB. Our intelligent preprocessing optimizes your image for the best pixel art conversion results.

item-2.title: Official Wplace 64-Color Palette
item-2.description: Use the exact same color palette as Wplace.live with 64 carefully selected colors. Choose between free colors (available 24/7) and premium colors for the perfect artistic expression. Apply quick color themes or select individual colors.

item-3.title: Real-time Preview & Controls
item-3.description: Watch your pixel art come to life with instant previews. Adjust pixel size, zoom in/out, drag to pan, and hover to see exact coordinates and color information. Grid overlay helps with precise placement planning.

item-4.title: Export for Wplace.live
item-4.description: Download your pixel art as clean PNG files or with grid overlays for planning. Get detailed statistics about colors used, time requirements, and free vs premium pixel counts. One click to open Wplace.live and start placing!

faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.subtitle: Everything you need to know about converting images to Wplace pixel art

item-1.question: What is Wplace.live and how does this converter help?
item-1.answer: Wplace.live is a massive collaborative pixel art canvas with 4 trillion pixels - a million times bigger than Reddit's r/place. Our converter transforms any image into pixel art using the official 64-color palette, making it easy to create art for the platform.

item-2.question: What image formats are supported?
item-2.answer: We support PNG, JPG, and SVG files up to 5MB. The converter automatically optimizes your image for the best pixel art conversion results using the official Wplace color palette.

item-3.question: How long does it take to place pixel art on Wplace.live?
item-3.answer: Each pixel has a 30-second cooldown (same as the original r/place). Our converter shows you the exact time estimate based on your pixel count, so you can plan your projects accordingly.

item-4.question: What's the difference between free and premium colors?
item-4.answer: Wplace.live has 64 colors total: some are free (available 24/7) and others are premium (require paid placement). Our converter identifies which colors you're using and shows the breakdown so you can optimize costs.

item-5.question: How do I use the exported pixel art on Wplace.live?
item-5.answer: Download your pixel art as a clean PNG or with grid overlay for planning. Use the coordinates and color information to place pixels precisely on Wplace.live. We also provide a direct link to open the platform.

item-6.question: Can I collaborate with others on pixel art projects?
item-6.answer: Yes! Export your pixel art with grid overlays and coordinate information to share with your team. Many communities use our converter to plan collaborative projects on Wplace.live.

item-7.question: How accurate is the color conversion?
item-7.answer: We use advanced color matching algorithms to find the closest colors in the official 64-color Wplace palette. You can also manually select which colors to use for complete control over the conversion.

item-8.question: Is the converter free to use?
item-8.answer: Yes! Our pixel art converter is completely free. We provide unlimited conversions, real-time previews, and all export features at no cost. Just upload, convert, and create!

testimonials.title: Loved by Pixel Artists Worldwide
testimonials.subtitle: See what creators are saying about our Wplace pixel art converter

item-1.name: Nori
item-1.quote: We kicked off a city crest in under twenty minutes. The converter made it so easy to get our design onto Wplace.live perfectly!

item-2.name: Nika
item-2.quote: Now I lock a 16-color palette, check map pixel alignment, and boom - I know exactly where to place each pixel. Game changer!

item-3.name: Mateo
item-3.quote: Exports are practical for our team coordination. Our coordination pings dropped by about 40% since using this tool.

item-4.name: Sarah Chen
item-4.quote: The official 64-color palette integration is perfect. No more guessing if my colors will work on Wplace.live!

item-5.name: Alex Rodriguez
item-5.quote: Time estimates are super helpful for planning our group projects. We can see exactly how long each piece will take.

item-6.name: Jamie Thompson
item-6.quote: The drag and drop interface is intuitive, and the real-time preview makes it easy to fine-tune before committing.

item-7.name: Morgan Kim
item-7.quote: Love the grid overlay feature! It helps so much with precise placement planning on the massive Wplace canvas.

item-8.name: River Johnson
item-8.quote: Our community uses this for all our Wplace projects. The free vs premium pixel breakdown is incredibly useful.

item-9.name: Taylor Davis
item-9.quote: Best pixel art converter I've used for Wplace. The color themes feature saves me so much time in planning.

item-10.name: Rodrigo Aguilar
item-10.quote: I love MkSaaS ❤️. The component blocks are well-structured, simple to use, and beautifully designed. It makes it really easy to have a good-looking website in no time.

item-11.name: Eric Ampire
item-11.quote: MkSaaS templates are the perfect solution for anyone who wants to create a beautiful and functional website without any web design experience.

item-12.name: Roland Tubonge
item-12.quote: MkSaaS is so well designed that even with a very poor knowledge of web design you can do miracles. Let yourself be seduced!

howToUse.title: How to Convert Images to Pixel Art
howToUse.subtitle: Simple 5-Step Process
howToUse.description: Transform any image into Wplace-ready pixel art in minutes. Follow our step-by-step guide to create amazing collaborative art.

step1.title: Upload Your Image
step1.description: Drag and drop your PNG, JPG, or SVG file (up to 5MB) into the converter. Our tool instantly analyzes your image for optimal pixel art conversion.
step1.tip: 💡 Tip: Images with clear shapes and defined colors work best for pixel art conversion.

step2.title: Customize Settings
step2.description: Adjust pixel size from 1px (ultra detail) to 50px (simple). Select from the official 64-color Wplace palette or choose specific color themes.
step2.tip: 🎨 Pro tip: Use smaller pixel sizes for detailed artwork, larger sizes for simple designs or faster placement.

step3.title: Preview & Refine
step3.description: Watch your pixel art come to life with real-time preview. Zoom, pan, and hover over pixels to see coordinates and color information.
step3.tip: 🔍 Use the grid overlay to plan precise placement on Wplace.live's massive canvas.

step4.title: Export Your Art
step4.description: Download as clean PNG or with grid overlay for planning. Get detailed statistics about colors used, time estimates, and pixel counts.
step4.tip: 📊 Check free vs premium pixel breakdown to optimize your placement strategy.

step5.title: Start Placing on Wplace.live
step5.description: Use our direct link to open Wplace.live and start placing your pixels. Each pixel has a 30-second cooldown, just like the original r/place.
step5.tip: 🌍 Coordinate with friends or communities for large collaborative art projects!

cta.title: Ready to Start Converting?
cta.description: Join thousands of artists creating amazing pixel art on Wplace.live. Our converter makes it easy to transform any image into collaborative art.

calltoaction.title: Ready to Create Amazing Pixel Art?
calltoaction.description: Transform your images into stunning pixel art for Wplace.live in seconds. Join thousands of artists creating on the world's largest collaborative canvas.
